attributes.title: Scariest moment of my LIFEğŸ˜­
attributes.review: I had downloaded this app because I wanted to enjoy my dearest president but when I had downloaded my phone started spazzing and glitching out. I just thought that was normal so I continued and it started asking me for feet pics so I mean I started to get really freaked out. So I decided to finally give in and send them and thatâ€™s when everything went wrong. I started getting all these phone calls and text saying they were gonna come to my house and slaughter me and my family if I didnâ€™t play this game. So I decided to play this game and they were telling me to do all this weird stuff like go smack a clown, twerk in public, lick a tree. But on this one they told me to do I had to refuse they wanted me to go streaking and thatâ€™s a no. So then right after I tried lying to them and they found out and tried to murder my friendğŸ˜­luckily she got out with some cuts and bruises. So I continued this little game and the last question was letâ€™s see if you can survive. So basically they gave me a knife and gave me three questions about our president the big shrimp dick, limp dick, racist, rapist, homophobic etc. loving president trump. And I got one question wrong and that was does he have a big dick and ofc I said no cause I mean I saw the pics but anyways they came charging at me and said I had 7 hours to survive I ran for my dear LIFEE!! I decided to hide up a tree but the found me so I started throwing acorns at them and was on the run again. I found a secret bunker because I remember Trump and how he was in his bunker love bunker boy btw xoxoğŸ˜˜ but anyways now I had 1 hour left and hereâ€™s where stuff started to get even worse they told me they had my family so I had to go out and surrender so when they came charging for me again they all ran into each other and ended up killing each other. So I cut my family loose and we fled away. But turns out they werenâ€™t dead they were just badly injured and were still coming for us. So we had to fight and with one minute on the clock we had escaped and survived. Thank God I advice you to NEVER download this app if you donâ€™t want this to happen to you.
